ygData.subject: Re: See no evil...Hear no evil...Speak no evil...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah come on, don t go.  I think you have a lot of good ideas and I agree there are things that need to be fixed in our class as well as the many others in the
ygData.messageBody:
Ah come on, don't go. I think you have a lot of good ideas and I agree there are things that need to be fixed in our class as well as the many others in the game. I haven't had any stellar ideas strike me or I would be suggesting different types of spells as well... brain freeze...it no worky right now :)



-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Morrison <ken.morrison@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 12:44 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] See no evil...Hear no evil...Speak no evil...


Okay, this is Alhassim signing off...

After reading the last couple of subtle brush off posts regarding "lets work with what we have ..etc" I will no longer be posting to this list. (And the villagers rejoice..)

I still find it unbelievable at how complacent you "seekers of knowledge" are and at how many of the repetitive posts on this list concern "where can I find this spell or item" when the reader could just go back and read the archive to find his/her answer.

Anyway, my hats off to the people who suggested the Teleport Others/Tap Affinity type spells, that was the only thing I read that was worthwhile on this list.

Bye
